# 设置

底部工具栏

chrome://flags/#enable-chrome-duet

推荐的文章

chorme://flags/#interest-feed-content-suggestions
chrome://flags/#enable-ntp-remote-suggestions

地址栏搜索引擎Logo

chrome://flags/#omnibox-search-engine-logo
